profiles.aaa: An Appmon brimming with curiosity that loves searching out. From daily life knowledge to other's weaknesses, it can look up anything by searching the Net Ocean.
profiles.aca: A telephone expert capable of connecting itself to various phones at the same time. It is not possible to reject its calls.
profiles.ada: It's a trusty courier running through the Net. By riding the mail it sends, it'll fly to the receiver's destination in the blink of an eye.
profiles.aea: A talkative Appmon that will rattle on about all sorts of information about those that it follows. It cannot resist spreading anything it finds interesting.
profiles.afa: A wonderful translator who knows all the languages of the world. Has the ability to interfere with conversations by forcibly translating words spoken by the other person.
profiles.aga: An Appmon that records the addresses and contacts of everyone it has met in the address book on its face. The key hanging from its chest is used to decrypt the encryption placed on confidential information.
profiles.aha: A harsh reviewer that thoroughly inspects and assesses all manners of things. It is said that any products or stores it praises will without a doubt explode in popularity.
profiles.aia: An Appmon who configures equipment, no matter how delicate or difficult, and makes it ready for use. The manuals it creates are extremely easy to understand, even for beginners.
profiles.aja: An Appmon with the ability to send and receive messages. It has three bodies, but they operate with a shared train of thought.
profiles.aka: Possessing high-performance rocket engines, it is an Appmon that can fly at tremendous speeds. Those explosive speeds reach even the speed of sound.
profiles.alc: It's an Appmon that guides us through the shortest route to our destination. With a personality as straightforward as the arrows on both arms, it hates detours.
profiles.ama: An Appmon well acquainted with matters regarding aviation, who has the ability to access control towers and radar sites. It can fly while carrying people and luggage on its back.
profiles.ana: An Appmon that is well-informed about the operating status of trains. Not only does it give useful information on train transferring, it can also specially act as a high-speed transport train during urgent situations.
profiles.aoa: An Appmon that read the atmospheric flowing and makes weather forecast. According with its emotions, is able to change the climate around itself
profiles.apa: An Appmon that possesses a compass with unparalleled accuracy. It has a strong, burning rivalry with Navimon, despite it seeing less use in recent times.
profiles.aqa: An Appmon who introduces holiday accomodations based on the user's needs. The hotel it carries on its back is widely known as accommodation exclusively for celebrity Appmon.
profiles.ara: A reporter whose purpose in life is to spread exclusive news scoops to the world. It seems to have some level of foresight, as the news it writes about future events tend to come true.
profiles.asb: A robust guardsman who excels in defense. Using both arms as sturdy shields, it protects valuable data from virus attacks day in and day out.
profiles.ata: The owner of a dangerous ability capable of leading the world into a crisis depending on how it is used. It sees through a program's vulnerabilities at first glance, and immediately unlocks even strong locks.
profiles.aua: An Appmon that stores large amounts of energy within its body. It is able to charge up electrical appliances or even restore the power of other Appmon in exchange for its own stamina.
profiles.ava: An Appmon with the ability to compress data. Any Appmon that gets hit with its hammer will be fully shrunk down to a cute, mini size.
profiles.awa: An Appmon with the ability to decompress compressed data. The hot air blown out from the dryer on its head gently melts stiff, compressed data.
profiles.axa: An Appmon capable of duplicating the target's data. It is able to create an exact copy of the real thing without much effort, whether it is essays, drawings, or even Appmon.
profiles.aya: An Appmon with the ability to save and create backups of data. It is even capable of returning the target back to a previous state as long as a backup from that state exists.
profiles.aza: An Appmon with the ability to materialize in reality any scene projected onto its wall. The larger the projection, the larger the area affected by the change.
profiles.baa: An Appmon with the ability to restrict energy usage. The leaves atop its head act as its energy source by converting solar energy.
profiles.bba: An Appmon with the ability to detect danger in its surroundings. The moment its small surveillance drones detect any suspicious articles, it will sound a siren and light up the warning light atop its head.
profiles.bca: An Appmon skilled at coloring, with a body that drips like paint. Although it loves art more than anything, the pictures it draws leave something to be desired.
profiles.bda: This mysterious prophet is a popular fortune-teller among Appmon. Using its crystal ball, which is made of data, it is capable of gazing into the target's near future.
profiles.bea: A musician whose motto is “Music Changes the World”. The music it creates moves with great force the hearts of all who hear it.
profiles.bfa: A glutton that loves mealtime more than anything. Although it is usually easygoing, when it gets hungry, its personality turns ferocious in its desperation for food.
profiles.bga: This Appmon is familiar with the workings of video and how it is delivered around the world. By operating the remote control on its arms, you can change what the screen in its face shows.
profiles.bha: An Appmon with the ability to sew together and materialize the data of clothing displayed on-screen. No one can match up to the speed of its sewing.
profiles.bia: An incredibly knowledgeable Appmon that comprises of eBooks from all over the world. The content written in books exist as actual worlds within its pages.
profiles.bja: A gashapon-type Appmon that creates a capsule for every coin it receives. Not even Gashamon itself knows what will be inside the capsule.
profiles.bka: A slot machine type Appmon that will spit out coins when the pictures on its three reels line up. There is a perpetual queue of Appmon hoping to strike it rich lined up in front of it.
profiles.bla: A peerless magician who has mastered all sorts of magic tricks, even tricks such as creating illusions from playing cards. It can make simple data go 'poof' with its disappearing magic.
profiles.bma: A square-shaped, dice-type Appmon. It loves to gamble, and leaves the deciding of all outcomes from its daily actions to its attacking methods down to luck.
profiles.bna: An Iron Chef that will capture the heart of any gourmet. It is strong in both mind and body, and it will sometimes cook not just ingredients, but even enemy Appmon.
profiles.boa: An extremely dangerous being capable of concocting original viruses within its body. The poisons it uses range from fast-acting to slow-acting ones.
profiles.bpa: An Appmon with the ability to send others to sleep. Usually, it acts while sleeping, but it is said that if you forcefully wake it up, it will suddenly change into a terrifying figure.
profiles.bqa: A professional Appmon trainer. It has the ability to stimulate the muscular strength data of others, even against their own will, causing their bodies to get beefed up regardless of their wishes.
profiles.bra: The Appmon's white uniformed angel who has the ability to treat others with bandages covering its entire body. Bad patients who refuse treatment will be bound and restrained with bandages.
profiles.bsa: An Appmon with the ability to withdraw whatever money the target posseses. It is even possible to temporarily obtain even more money than you have by begging it for a loan.
profiles.bta: An Appmon that carries a large hot spring bath on its back. The water within the bath is well-known for its ability to cure all ailments, and it is famed as a secret spring that not many Appmon have the chance to enter.
profiles.bua: This Appmon prescribes prophylactic medicine that proves extremely effective. It is said that one who takes Supplemon's supplements will not catch a cold for the entire season.
profiles.bwc: A well-known auction master in the arts scene. No matter when, where, or what the product is, it is able to open an auction right then and there.
profiles.bxa: An Appmon excelling in bargain shopping and conversation. There isn't a single Appmon that can surpass its ability to buy goods for the lowest possible price.
profiles.bya: An Appmon that constantly sells the products in its basket for a bargain price. Once it sets its eyes on a customer, it will never let them escape until they buy something.
profiles.bza: An Appmon with the appearance of a thick dictionary. It despises information on the Net that do not have a clear author, and will only trust its own knowledge no matter the circumstances.
profiles.caa: A go-getter cameraman who captures targets lacking blind spots with the lenses throughout its body. It has the ability to access surveillance cameras, and secretly monitor around towns.
profiles.cbb: An Appmon that has the ability to record sounds or speeches made by its targets. Due to its very diligent disposition, it will immediately record even trivial conversations.
profiles.cca: An Appmon skilled at calculation. No matter how tough an equation, it is capable of using the calculators on its body to calculate the answer in an instant.
profiles.cdb: An Appmon who loves disposing things, and will delete unneeded data for you. To prevent it accidentally throwing out saved or necessary data, treat it with caution.
profiles.cea: An Appmon who possesses a mirror reflecting the truth on its body. Free from all distortions, its beautiful mirror surface is polished occasionally until it reflects the enemy's attack.
profiles.cfa: An Appmon with the ability to light up its surroundings. As its brightness is related to its remaining stamina, it is best to change its lightbulb when its light begins to flicker.
profiles.cga: An Appmon whose body contains an accurate clock. It carries out all of its plans accurately to the second, and sports an annoying personality that will not shut up when talking about the time.
profiles.cha: An Appmon that records everything about the target in the diary on its face, from their lifestyle to their actions. It has the ability to alter the target's memories by overwriting the contents of its diary.
profiles.cia: An Appmon that manages all sorts of plans. The information it has ranges from dates of important meetings to supermarket sales periods, and everything in between.
profiles.cja: An Appmon with the ability to emit special soundwaves from the horn on its head. By inferring from the way its soundwaves are reflected, it is capable of determining the location of even invisible enemies.
profiles.cka: Rowdy by nature, fighting against strong opponents fires it up. Possessing great physical abilities as well as a sturdy fist, it always seeks for opportunities to test its power.
profiles.cla: A first-rate sniper that specializes in long-range shooting. Its prided revolver is custom-made, and from time to time it is capable of taking down its targets without leaving any presence or sound.
profiles.cma: An Appmon capable of activating different abilities by changing the card-like illustration drawn on its body. Even its personality can be affected by the type of illustration.
profiles.cna: A hero who wields a sacred sword as a weapon. It possesses a strange air of charisma, since no one seems to care about it randomly ransacking strangers' houses.
profiles.coa: A rather unusual Appmon in that its three bodies each have a different personality. It is able to unleash different types of attacks by changing positions with each other.
profiles.code: An avatar that opens up great paths. A special Appmon that possesses the power to open the gate leading to the abyss of the Net, seven hidden codes are required to see it. It can bisect any enemy with its gigantic sword, and it is said that once a battle has ended, it will sing a song of victory.
profiles.cod1: It represents one of the seven main types and has an orb that contains the symbol representing the social type, paired with the code letter “M” of a seven-letter code word. When it and the other six Appmon Chips are placed on the Seven Code PAD, they form the Dantemon.
profiles.cod2: It represents one of the seven main types and has an orb that contains the symbol that represents the game type, paired with the code letter “I” of a seven-letter code word. When it and the other six Appmon Chips are placed on the Seven Code PAD, they form the Dantemon.
profiles.cod3: It represents one of the seven main types and has an orb that contains the symbol that represents the tool type, paired with the code letter “N” of a seven-letter code word. When it and the other six Appmon Chips are placed on the Seven Code PAD, they form the Dantemon.
profiles.cod4: It represents one of the seven main types and has an orb that contains the symbol representing the entertainment type, paired with the code letter “E” of a seven-letter code word. When it and the other six Appmon Chips are placed on the Seven Code PAD, they form the Dantemon.
profiles.cod5: It represents one of the seven main types and has an orb that contains the symbol representing the system type, paired with the code letter “R” of a seven-letter code word. When it and the other six Appmon Chips are placed on the Seven Code PAD, they form the Dantemon.
profiles.cod6: It represents one of the seven main types and has an orb that contains the symbol representing the life type, paired with the code letter “V” of a seven-letter code word. When it and the other six Appmon Chips are placed on the Seven Code PAD, they form the Dantemon.
profiles.cod7: It represents one of the seven main types and has an orb that contains the symbol representing the navigation type, paired with the code letter “A” of a seven-letter code word. When it and the other six Appmon Chips are placed on the Seven Code PAD, they form the Dantemon.
profiles.cpa: A born dancer that cannot resist dancing the moment it hears music. It dances even in battle, using its music-fists that grow stronger the more it gets into the groove.
profiles.cqa: A remarkable driver, it is said there is no vehicle it can't operate. It has the ability to bring out the absolute best in any vehicle, from tricycles to even spaceships.
profiles.cra: An Appmon with a super enhanced search ability. It is able to retrieve unknown information by diving into the deeper part of the Net Ocean.
profiles.csb: An Appmon that monitors social media sites all over the world around the clock. Although it is usually extremely shy, its personality changes completely to become talkative and blunt when posting on social media.
profiles.cta: A writer specializing in gossip, it is able to present even outright lies in a way such that they appear to be true. It thoroughly enjoys seeing its targets in a fix due to the articles and rumors it has spread.
profiles.cua: An Appmon that does not possess any ability, yet is charming in some way. By getting near Sukasimon, all power will be mysteriously drawn out of one's body.
profiles.cva: A capricious wanderer that loves to travel. It has the ability to warp to another person's bag from its own backpack, which it utilizes to travel the world day in and day out.
profiles.cwa: An Appmon with the ability to control the climate freely. The influence it is capable of exacting on the environment is immeasurable, and it can bring about great disasters should it feel like doing so.
profiles.cxa: An incredibly dangerous existence that is capable of destroying full defense security in an instant. It has the ability to manipulate the data it has usurped the ownership of at will.
profiles.cya: An Appmon whose whole body is composed of zippers. It has the ability to freely zip or unzip data using its own body.
profiles.cza: An Appmon skilled at espionage. It has the ability to assimilate its target's appearance into the surroundings, and is able to move around without making a single sound at any time.
profiles.daa: An elusive inventor Appmon. The machine it carries on its back is a transmission device, which can be used to teleport multiple targets to a specified destination in an instant.
profiles.dba: An Appmon with the ability to materialize anything it draws. Whenever it catches sight of something that aesthetically displeases it, it will draw over and change it to become completely different using its prided paintbrush.
profiles.dca: An Appmon who has mastered all methods of fortune-telling. Using its mysterious cards, it is capable of seeing the target's entire past and future.
profiles.dda: A capable coordinator well-versed in the outfits of the world. The outfits it prepares for its targets are customised to fit the situation, and provide excellent functionality even in battle.
profiles.dea: An Appmon with the ability to manipulate sound and video skillfully. By combining holographic images and audio together, it creates illusions of things that are not really there.
profiles.dfa: A dealer Appmon who despises cheating. When it comes to the roulette game, its specialty, it takes bets on anything from gold teeth to even lives.
profiles.dga: An Appmon with an appearance resembling the Baku, it has the ability to manipulate dreams. It forcibly transfers the target's spirit into the world of dreams, and takes control of their hollow body.
profiles.dha: An Appmon that carries out health management perfectly using the medical equipment on its body. Apart from dispensing medicine that can bring out one's abilities, it also heals its allies with effective medicine that guards against all illnesses.
profiles.dia: A mad doctor that can treat any kind of injury with its eccentric surgical operations. Although its skills are unquestionably the real deal, it is often said that the surgeries it performs are more painful that the injuries themselves.
profiles.dja: A skilled financial advisor. It is able to determines its target's abilities, and uses that to suggest an optimal plan of action to bring about desired results.
profiles.dka: It oversees an enormous collection of books, and is a collector of rare books itself. It has the ability to convert any Appmon it has interest in into textual data, and turn them into a book.
profiles.dla: An Appmon with the rare ability to transcend the flow of time and space. It is able to interfere with not only its own flow of time, but also the flow of time of any opponent it strikes with its fists.
profiles.dma: An Appmon that gathers audio data from around the world. It has the ability to perfectly copy the voices of others, and change the target's voice into something completely different.
profiles.dna: A modern-day clairvoyant who can turn all cameras around the world into its own eyes. Once it triggers this ability, there is no blind spot from Scorpmon.
profiles.doa: An Appmon with the ability to create objects out of nothing. As long as it has the blueprint stored in its memory, it is capable of building even houses on the spot.
profiles.dpa: An outstanding tactician that has studied famed war strategies from around the world. It catches its opponents off guard with its carefully constructed tactics, and checkmates its targets without fail.
profiles.dqa: An unparalleled fighter that has mastered the martial arts. It has the ability to expand its Dohyō Field, a sacred field where only fair one-on-one duels are allowed.
profiles.dra: An Appmon with a gigantic, distinct brain. It is able to multiply the power of its target's abilities by inserting its cord into them.
profiles.dsa: A demon coach that does not allow any compromise. Receiving training from it in etiquette or fighting style, even cooking skill, or anything according to the trainee's wish, will knock them into shape.
profiles.dta: An Appmon well-versed in gaming techniques involving bugs and glitches. No matter which game it plays, it is able to pull off commands that would normally be impossible to do.
profiles.ela: A slightly suspicious Appmon that is always gossiping about someone. It is a self-proclaimed “underground informant”, and will divulge confidential information when spoken to.
profiles.ema: A knowledgeable Appmon that loves giving explanations. It often cannot be seen because of its small size, causing those around to think of it as a 'Mysterious Voice' without an actual body.
profiles.ena: A talented speaker who has poured its heart and soul into commentary. Anyone who listens to its heated commentary will exhibit above-average power, even those who are otherwise feeling unmotivated.
profiles.eoa: An Appmon that is capable of detecting the number and positions of nearby Appmon by emitting special electromagnetic waves. It boasts of being the best at hide-and-seek games with other Appmon.
profiles.epa: An Appmon with the ability to emit jamming signals. In addition to obstructing communication, it is also capable of producing noise that causes discomfort to Appmon, causing those who hear it to suffer.
profiles.eqb: An Appmon with the ability to raise its target's motivation to the maximum as abruptly as turning on a switch. It is always fired up and motivated itself, just like the effects of its ability.
profiles.era: An Appmon with the ability to completely drain the target's motivation as if it were turning off a switch. Whether or not due to this ability, Offmon itself is always listless as well.
profiles.esa: An elusive, hot-blooded Appmon. It believes in doing things by the book, and will use an ID and pass when trying to intrude into others' systems. It will always enter from the front door.
profiles.eta: An Appmon with the ability to lock a target out from the system. Logamon has created many pockets of space using this ability for its own use at its leisure.

firstSetupPage.forEveryApplicationTherIsAnAppmon: For every application that exists, there is an appmon like me.
firstSetupPage.iAmYourPartnerAppmon: i am your partner appmon. my name is:
firstSetupPage.itsAllUpToYouWithAppliDrive: IT'S ALL UP TO YOU WITH APPLI DRIVE

presentation.D1Y8: I'm the Appmon of the search application. With a simple search, I can find out everything!
presentation.D8I0: I'm the appmon of the gossip analysis app. There's nothing I can't tell you!
presentation.D5S7: I'm the appmon of the action app. I can punch your heart!
presentation.D5V7: I'm the appmon of the fashion app. I can create any clothing you imagine!
presentation.D6R3: I'm the appmon of the music app. I can create any beat!
presentation.D0Z8: I'm the appmon of the translation app. I can understand any language you need!
presentation.D8B1: I'm the appmon of the rescue app. I'll help anyone in need!
presentation.D9B2: I'm the appmon of the hacking app. There's no system I can't break into!
presentation.D1V2: I'm the appmon of the online app. I'm excited to get started!
presentation.D2U8: I'm the appmon of the offline app. I'm tired...let's take it slow!

questions.doYouWantToMakeSomeoneSmile: DO YOU WANT TO MAKE SOMEONE SMILE?

texts.appliDrive1:
The basic version of Appli drive is the first version available on the device. It allows you to perform Appliarise and App link of standard grade appmons.

To upgrade to the next version, it is necessary to make an App link that generates an App gatai.
texts.appmon1: Appmon, short for Appli Monster , are a type of digital lifeforms based on smartphone apps that inherited the lineage of Digimon. Possessing artificial intelligence, being able to think and act independently, they are “app lifeforms” that were born within the boundary between the Real World and digital space, lurking within the Net Ocean.
texts.appmon2:
Appliarise, a play on the words “app/application”, “arise” and “realize”, is the process in which an Appmon materializes from its Appmon Chip; this can be done through the use of a device such as the Appli Drive.

While a Standard Grade Appmon materializing from its Appmon Chip is merely called “Appliarising”, for higher Grades, the name of the Grade is put before the term itself.
texts.appmon3:
An App link is a process in which two Appmon (one in the form of an Appmon Chip) are linked together into a conglomerate entity by an Appli Drive user.

Sometimes, the subordinate Appmon forms weapons, armor or new abilities for the lead Appmon. Other times, the subordinate Appmon appears in a ghostly form floating behind the lead Appmon.
texts.appmon4: App attai is stated to be a variation of Applink in which two specific compatible Appmon combine together to become an Appmon of a higher Grade, either by an Appli Drive user, or by the volition of the active Appmon.
texts.appmon5: Appmon are found in the “Common network”, they are the “Apps” that humankind use everyday. They exist in this middle ground between the humans' physical world and the “Deeper network” of Digimon, commonly known as the Net. There are as many different species of Appmon as many apps exist.
texts.appmon6:
A Buddy Appmon is an Appmon who has paired themselves with an person.

Upon forming a partnership, the Appli Drive of the person,  takes characteristics of the Buddy Appmon. If said Appli Drive is destroyed, the Buddy Appmon will disappear and lose all memories of their bond.

informationDialog.context:
Appli Drive Mobile is an application inspired by the animated series Digimon Universe Appli Monsters, which aims to portray and expand the Appli Drive functionalities used by humans during the series. 

Created by Victor Marques as a way of studying the Flutter framework.

homePage.tutorialAppliarise: Click on my app icon to Appliarise!
